pr_title: Improves the error message throws when loading columns of a CSV file

timeline.message: Improves the error message throws when loading columns of a CSV file
Improves the error message throws when loading columns of a CSV file

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ImportDictionary.tooManyColumns = The record contains too many columns (${count}). ${columns} columns were expected. Please verify the used field delimiter (usually semicolon) and field enclosure (üblicherweise double quotes).
          
          
            
            ImportDictionary.tooManyColumns = The record contains too many columns (${count}). ${columns} columns were expected. Please verify the used field delimiter (usually semicolon) and field enclosure (usually double quotes).
timeline.author: fhaScireum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -241,7 +241,7 @@ ImportDictionary.mappingFunction = Column assignments
 ImportDictionary.missingColumn = The ${index} ('${expected}') column is missing.
 ImportDictionary.severeFieldError = Exception error while checking field ${field} (${label}): ${message}
 ImportDictionary.superfluousColumn = The column ${index} ('${column}') is unexpected.
-ImportDictionary.tooManyColumns = The record contains too many columns (${count}). ${columns} columns were expected.
+ImportDictionary.tooManyColumns = The record contains too many columns (${count}). ${columns} columns were expected. Please verify the used field delimiter (usually semicolon) and field enclosure (üblicherweise double quotes).
